backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: rebranding SurvivalGuideSection to 'Timmy & Ricay' and adding a full-screen code entry gate (code: 2112) with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend file paths to short descriptions summarizing each component's purpose and styling within the Backrooms/Dreamcore themed site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'Into The Backrooms' with meta/Open Graph tags, Google Fonts imports for Special Elite and Share Tech Mono, and a root div for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full page layout: CodeEntryGate overlay, NavBar, all content sections (Hero, Backrooms, Levels, Dreamcore, Survival Guide), and Footer.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterSlide: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/CodeEntryGate.ts: Full-screen Backrooms-styled gate overlay that blocks site access until the user enters code '2112', with sessionStorage persistence, grain/scanline textures, and a glitch animation on wrong input.
frontend/src/components/DreamcoreSection: Dreamcore aesthetic section featuring explanatory copy, a 2Ã—2 image grid with hover caption overlays, and scroll-triggered fade-in animations using soft pastel lavender/cyan accents.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Empty component file with no implemented content.
Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with 'Into The Backrooms' branding, smooth-scroll navigation links, system status readout, fan project disclaimer, and fluorescent liminal palette styling.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a Backrooms-themed background image, animated title fade-in, flickering fluorescent light effects, and a scroll-down chevron button.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/LevelsSection.ts: Displays a catalogue of four Backrooms levels (Level 0, Level 1, Level !, Poolrooms) as cards with images, descriptions, and danger tags, using IntersectionObserver for staggered fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with scroll-aware background blur, smooth-scroll links to page sections, a diamond logo, and a responsive hamburger menu for mobile.
frontend/src/components/ParticleAnimatio: Canvas-based particle animation that renders rising gold and violet floating particles with fade-in/out lifecycle, used as a decorative background overlay.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/StickyCTA.tsx: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/SurvivalGuideSec: Renders a numbered list of five Backrooms survival tips attributed to 'Timmy & Ricay', with staggered IntersectionObserver fade-in animations and a fluorescent aesthetic.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/TransformationSe: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/components/WhatAreBackrooms: Two-column section explaining the Backrooms concept, featuring a recovered hallway photo with scanline and corner-marker overlays alongside descriptive copy, with staggered fade-in on scroll.
frontend/src/components/WhatWeEnhanceSec: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to set a visibility flag when a referenced element scrolls into view, enabling scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining a Backrooms/Dreamcore-themed design system with Tailwind directives, OKLCH CSS custom properties, typography utilities, grain/paper textures, and scroll animation classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with a Backrooms/Dreamcore color palette using OKLCH values, custom font families, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking the current version, summary, and existing features of a Backrooms/Dreamcore-themed website, replacing a previous Dark Fantasy landing page project.
